title: This New Protocol Will Change AI Coding Forever (ACP)
description:
The future of AI coding is here. Zed just introduced ACP (Agent Client Protocol) - an open standard (similar to MCP) that connects any code editor to any AI coding assistant. Zed’s integration is only in beta, but if you want a glimpse into how we’ll all be working with AI in the near future – this is it.

In this video, I’ll show you ACP in action:
- Running both Claude Code and Gemini CLI threads in Zed
- Watching Claude Code make live code changes you can accept or reject (always wished I had this!)
- How ACP works, why it’s so powerful, and how it builds on protocols like LSP and MCP
- Spinning up a custom ACP agent so you can build your own coding agents and launch them as threads
- Bonus: a quick Archon demo, showing how it can manage Claude Code instances through ACP

Note - this video is NOT sponsored by Zed. I'm genuinely blown away by ACP and want to share it with you! :)
